step1.title: Consult & Site Visit
step1.desc:
- On-site visit to measure actual space
- Gather client lifestyle preferences and budget requirements

step2.title: Design Presentation
step2.desc: - Deliver moodboard, layout, and 3D perspectives for material selection and atmosphere approval

step3.title: Estimate & BOQ
step3.desc:
- Provide clear cost summary and detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ)
- Flexible adjustments to match client budget

step4.title: Construction Begins
step4.desc: - Begin construction with continuous updates via a real-time project tracking system

step5.title: Handover & Styling
step5.desc:
- Final styling and furnishing before move-in
- Thorough quality inspection to ensure readiness for living

about.title: About Us
about.quote: We don’t just build spaces — we design the way you live.
about.desc:
, we believe that exceptional design and precise execution are the foundation of timeless spaces. As a full-service design and build firm, we offer an integrated approach that brings together creative vision, technical expertise, and meticulous craftsmanship to deliver projects that exceed expectations.

Founded with a passion for aesthetics and functionality, Lelusso specializes in architectural design, interior design, construction, renovation, and turnkey project management. Our team is composed of dedicated professionals who work closely with clients to understand their vision, lifestyle, and needs—transforming ideas into elegant, livable realities.

From concept development to the final handover, we are committed to ensuring a seamless experience, uncompromising quality, and attention to detail in every phase. Whether it's a new home, a commercial renovation, or a custom interior project, Lelusso is your trusted partner for refined, end-to-end solutions.

step1.title: One-Stop, Hassle-Free Service
step1.desc: From concept to construction, Lelusso offers a fully integrated design and build solution. Our end-to-end service streamlines the entire process—saving you time, eliminating complexity, and ensuring a smooth, professional experience throughout.

step2.title: Spaces Designed to Enhance Productivity
step2.desc: We thoughtfully design every space to align with your lifestyle and support a more productive daily routine. Whether it’s a home office that boosts focus, efficient storage that reduces clutter, or natural lighting that uplifts your mood—we create environments that work for you.

step3.title: Meticulous Attention to Detail
step3.desc: At Lelusso, we believe that great design lives in the details. From materials and finishes to layout and functionality, every aspect is carefully considered to deliver timeless elegance with everyday practicality.

step4.title: Professional Team, Dedicated Support
step4.desc: Our experienced architects, designers, and project managers work closely with you at every stage. We provide clear communication, regular updates, and expert guidance to ensure your vision is brought to life with precision and care.
